topics.body:
YOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!

Woolie just beat a fucking Love-Craftion God on his first go!

Also, yeah the Bloodborne comment section for Pat and woolies LP is getting annoying now.

He just beat a boss on his first try and they are still bitching, acting like "His weapon is OP and boring" and "He still used to many Blood vials".

Guys we get it, Woolie isn't playing the game perfect. but for gods sake this is their first playthrough, PLUS they said they wouldn't play the game at home really so you expect him to get better when the only time he gets to play the game is when they DO THE LP.

I mean come on man.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

It's about an "Explorer" (basically a mercenary) who has the power to eat ANY inorganic material and use it to fight. And get this. His name is *BOLT CRANK.* That is his name! Bolt. Crank.
